experiences.name: Frontend Developer Intern
experiences.content: For the first half of the internship, I took part in data analysis on 6 different buildings in Central, Hong Kong. I gained experience in generating data reports. For the second half of the internship, I returned to my original role for web development. I assisted in the development of private websites for 2 of the mentioned 6 buildings, and display the data trends of each sensor within a period of time. I gained advanced knowledge in web development and project.
experiences.tools: Data Science: DBeaver, Anaconda, Pycharm, Jupyter Notebook. Web Development: GitHub, Laragon, Vue CLI, Plotly.js, Vue.js. Project Management: Slack

experiences.name: Frontend Developer Intern
experiences.content: I refactored hard-coded components with Plotly.js data charts into fully customisable widgets. I also added search filters and updating loading methods for outdated pages. At last, I created a path splitting algorithm to a point mapping page for the team's fellow data scientists to upload, configure, and download CSV points lists, with auto-suggestions for sensors and sensor names referencing a dictionary.
experiences.tools: Backend Integreation: DBeaver, Anaconda, Pycharm, Jupyter Notebook, Flask. Web Development: GitHub, Laragon, Vue CLI, Plotly.js, Vue.js. Project Management: Slack, Notion

homepage.text: I am a student enrolled in the Computer Engineering programme of the Chinese University of Hong Kong.

interests.name: Drums
interests.description: I have 15 years of experience in drumming, and I recieved the certificate of Grade 8 in drums with distinction by Trinity College London (Rock and Pop). My focus is on progressive rock and punk rock music, which emphasizes on the power, speed and accuracy. I have done drum covers of Rush and Green Day, which suits my drumming style.

interests.name: Football
interests.description: I have watched football for 17 years, playing it for 8 years. I play as a centre back, and my strengths are tackling, interceptions and headers. My style of play is very aggressive and ruthless which frequently resulted in fouls. I am an avid supporter of Chelsea F.C and my football idols include John Terry, Tony Adams and Paolo Maldini.

interests.name: WWII History
interests.description: I am deeply interested in war history, particularly between the period of 1914-1945. I would do research on Adolf Hitler, the greatest of evil in the 21st century, and look into the roots of his ideals and how he created a murderous regime. These readings enhances my logical reasoning and critical thinking, and learn not to seperate the intertwined relationship between political, social, and economic aspects of every decision.

interests.name: Programming
interests.description: Since the start of college, I have invested a lot of time in programming. I learnt the basic concepts of Python and Java, and I have self-taught HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I enjoy the process of breaking down a problematic idea into small chunks, and when I solve them, I feel very motivated. I am currently learning advanced JavaScript and will take classes of C++ for my bachelors degree.

introduction.text: I am a year 2 student currently enrolled in the Associate of Engineering (Computer Science) from HKU SPACE. I have been admitted to the Bachelor of Engineering (Computer Engineering) programme of CUHK for the upcoming semester. I take pleasure from web development, having hands-on experience on web development in the last summer at Carnot Innovations Limited. I would also like to take part in other roles in the IT industry, primarily related to software engineering. I have acquired several important skills through my internship and projects, including UX/UI design for web and mobile users, and intermediate levels on the usage of NoSQL databases and REST APIs. Though I have experience in frontend design, I would also like to get my hands on backend operations. I have several hobbies, including playing football, drums (achieving Trinity College Rock & Pop grade 8 pass with distinction), and reading books on 1914-1945 war history.

learnings.title: Introduction to Computer Programming
learnings.description: This is an introductory course to programming in Python. Course teaching includes data types, variables, strings, flow Control, selections, loops, functions, lists and tuples, data file I/O, dictionaries, and a mini I/O project of a shopping order into a .txt file

learnings.title: Computer Architecture
learnings.description: This course includes the introduction to number representation formats, basic knowledge to digital logic, logic manipulation and memory control

learnings.title: Intorduction to Engineering
learnings.description: This course includes basic engineering physics in mechanics and electromagnetism, data chart display via Octave, signal and network systems

learnings.title: Introduction to Data Stuctures and Algorithms
learnings.description: This course is an extension to Introduction to Computer Programming, it includes lists, stacks and queues manipulation, binary tree and graph calculations, and searching and sorting methodologies.

learnings.title: Mathematics to Computing
learnings.description: Also known as discrete mathematics. Materials include basic logic, set theorem and functions, mathimatical induction and recursion, counting and discrete probability, and graph theory.

learnings.title: Object-Oriented Programming
learnings.description: This is a introductory course to Java. It includes every feature from the Introduction to Computer Programming course plus class features, exception handling and GUI programming

learnings.title: Internet Programming
learnings.description: This course introduces HTML, CSS and JavaScript for frontend programming. It also provides a breif introduction to Bootstrap, ASP, PHP, and some principles of software engineering.

learnings.title: Project on Knowledge Products Developement
learnings.description: This is a final year project course. Teachings included students proposing their pwon project ideas and integrating them and report to their supervisor every two weeks, recording progress and their product cycle.

learnings.title: Introduction to Database Systems
learnings.description: This course focuses on SQL database modelling via Apache OpenOffice. Content includes modelling, normalization, SQL commands, NOSQL databases. It also contains a project where a stock list of shoe purchases has to be store in the database.

learnings.title: Introduction to Computer Organisation
learnings.description: This course serves as an extension to the Introduction to Digital Logic Circuits course. It introduced the use of assembly language and the usage of intruction sets, the features of single and multiple cycle processors and pipelining

learnings.title: Problem Solving by Programming
learnings.description: An introductory course to the C language

projects.name: YouTeam - Team Management for YouTuber Groups
projects.description: A final-year project as a CS student at HKU SPACE. Gained intermediate experience with authentication, NoSQL databases, state management, RESTful API, and web hosting.
projects.tools: Firebase, Vuex, Plotly.js, YouTube Data API

projects.name: Simple Reaction Timer
projects.description: A simple reaction timer for me to learn/refresh the features of Vue 3. This project mainly displays my skills on event handling, where users can react at different intervals to get different results popped up on the screen.

projects.name: File Reader
projects.description: A page for users to import Excel or CSV files and display basic details in a data table

projects.name: Linear Motion Converter
projects.description: A page for users to input 3 parameters for linear motion, and displays the rest of the parameters

projects.name: Current Weather of a City
projects.description: A page for users to input a valid city name and displays the current weather details

projects.name: F1 Live Standings and Results
projects.description: A page to display current Formula 1 standings
projects.tools: Rapid API's F1 Live Motorsport Data API

projects.name: API tester
projects.description: A page to test my APIS

projects.name: COVID searcher
projects.description: A page to search for COVID cases for a country
